message: I see a weird stone formation in front of me. As I try approaching  the rocks, I'm are stopped by a powerful magical force.
I have found a path leading through the grotto. But then I realize that it is suddenly discontinued for a short time. Maybe this has something to do this the stones?
After defeating the Hira'zinn, the rock formation has fallen apart and somehow it made some hidden stones rise up so I can walk over them now.
In front of my I see a torch burning in purple color. I can feel the force coming from this item. I bettter shoudl leave it there and notify Lodar about this weird torch.
When pouring the vial's liquid over the torch, it suddenly burns a lot more and changes its color into green. I try to approach the torch carefully...
I repeat the ritual for every teleporter-torch I find.
